title: Meridian AI
description: AI-powered supply chain intelligence platform that reduces logistics costs by 30% through predictive demand forecasting and autonomous procurement. Serving mid-market manufacturers across DACH.

title: Coframe
description: No-code UI experimentation platform enabling product teams to continuously A/B test every element of their web app without touching code. Acquired by Adobe in 2023 for €42M.

title: Chromatic Graph Engine
description: Open-source WebGL-powered graph visualization library handling 1M+ nodes with real-time physics simulation. Used by data teams at CERN, Stripe, and 200+ companies worldwide.

title: Pulsar Finance
description: Real-time treasury management for European startups. Automated FX hedging, yield optimization on idle cash, and CFO-grade reporting — all in a single dashboard built for founders.

title: Tessellate Design System
description: Production-ready design system with 120+ accessible components, Figma primitives, and a token-first theming engine. Adopted by 15 product teams in Y Combinator's W24 batch.

title: Fable Social
description: Short-form audio storytelling platform where creators monetized episodic audio dramas via subscriptions. Reached 180K MAU before the market shift to video made scaling unsustainable.

title: Northstar CLI
description: Terminal-first project management tool for engineers who hate leaving their editor. Syncs with Linear, GitHub, and Notion. 12K GitHub stars, 3K weekly active users.

title: Lantern Health
description: Digital therapeutics platform for chronic pain management combining biometric wearables with CBT-based coaching. Raised €8M Series A, acquired by Philips Digital Health in 2022.

title: Void Protocol
description: Experimental generative art series exploring emergent complexity through recursive WebGL shaders. Each piece is unique, computed client-side, and minted as a compressed on-chain SVG.

title: Sediment
description: Geological data platform for mining exploration teams. Transforms raw drill-core data into 3D ore models using computer vision, cutting interpretation time from weeks to hours.

title: Resonance — UX Research Toolkit
description: Lightweight, privacy-first session replay and heatmap SDK. Drop-in script under 8KB gzipped, GDPR-compliant by design, self-hosted on any CDN. No vendor lock-in.
